bibl.title: Σῖτος / πυρός in Egypt as Deliberate Mixtures of Wheat with Barley. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: The terms σῖτος and πυρός, in the Roman and early Arab period, refer to unrefined mixed wheat and barley, not to pure wheat (καθαρός).
bibl.seg: MAYERSON Philip, Σῖτος / πυρός in Egypt as Deliberate Mixtures of Wheat with Barley. Avec résumé en anglais.
The terms σῖτος and πυρός, in the Roman and early Arab period, refer to unrefined mixed wheat and barley, not to pure wheat (καθαρός).
